description:
Noa`s Bellossom was first seen coming down the staircase at Dawn`s house with her trainer Noa.
Brock like all the girls he meets on his travels, instantly began flirting with Noa, but Bellossom was overprotective of her and quickly put a stop to his flirting with its Stun Spore.
name: Kireihana (Noa)
